text: I Can Get It for You Wholesale is a 1951 American romantic drama movie directed by Michael Gordon and based on the 1937 novel of the same name by Jerome Weidman. It stars Susan Hayward, Dan Dailey, George Sanders, Sam Jaffe, Harry von Zell. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Gordon
title: I Can Get It for You Wholesale (movie)
